name: Jaunt VR - Experience Cinematic Virtual Reality
description: Experience the widest array of premium cinematic virtual reality experiences with Jaunt's re-imagined fully immersive app. Jaunt delivers unparalleled and all enveloping VR experiences anytime, anywhere.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This is the future, no doubt about it. Ok, maybe Paul McCartney is not your kind of music, but lookup the video of him singing Live and Let Die at a live concert. You stand on stage next to his piano, you are amongst the band, you can see the audience, practically feel the heat from the fireworks, it's totally spectacular! Imagine experiencing any kind of gig or show like this and tell me it's not great! Also, sporting events, watch the ice hockey demo, brilliant! Want to watch the world cup final? One day you will virtually stand anywhere in the stadium or beside the pitch. I can't wait for it! For now 7/10. Potentially 20/10 :-)
Last time I tried this over a month ago, I closed it after 3 minutes.  I tried it again today, and it (still) has stuttering playback/headtrack relocation, which makes it unusable.
Cool concept! I'll thumbs up it hoping that some good updates are coming.
